title: [Sponsor] Sky Guide
content:
Sky Guide brings the beauty of the stars down to Earth. Thanks to AR, understanding the cosmos has never been simpler — just hold it overhead to automatically identify any star, constellation, planet or satellite. Developed as a native iOS app over the past decade by a small team, Sky Guide will transform the way you explore the night sky with easy-to-use, yet powerful features. Start your stargazing journey today!

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
